>

</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 184 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 24,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small, heart-shaped amulet appears to be sculpted from stone with a single streak of dim light running through, like an ember just beneath ashes. When worn, the amulet gives off a gentle warmth, akin to being near a fireplace. You gain [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) resistance 15 when wearing this amulet.

 When you invest the amulet, you either increase your Constitution score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.
